title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull, run and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama server, published on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model with folder organization, code syntax highlighting, and dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI REPL for chatting with Ollama models, available on npm as 'ollama-cli'.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama published to Maven Central; supports chat, generate, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama server, published on RubyGems as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: Collection of GitHub Actions for downloading, starting and chatting with Ollama in CI pipelines.

title: chatbox-ai
summary: Cross-platform desktop chat client (Electron) that supports Ollama and other providers; available on npm.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration package letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of recipes and examples showing how to integrate Ollama with Flask, FastAPI, Slack, Discord, etc.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by any Ollama model.
